basics.name: Shane Ray
basics.label: Senior Software Developer
basics.summary: Senior software developer specialized in systems/process integration and automation. I enjoy building tools that help others be more productive and happy.

work.summary: Led efforts of migration of companywide primary B/OSS legacy WCF client / server application to Web API and AngularJS system
highlights: Created integrated Git Flow development process via JIRA and Atlassian Stash with TeamCity and SlashHQ integration.
Implemented an automated continous delivery system using Octopus Deploy
Established best practices for REST API resources,and documentation via Swagger
Worked with key business stakeholders during acquisition for knowledge share and system integration
Wrote best practice guidelines and documentation for developer workflow and system design
Led daily standups and coordinated prioritization of work
Created and conducted development continuous education, and training on new policies and technology such as unit testing, GitFlow workflow, message queuing, and general developer productivity tips

Redesigned billing system, transitioning from a collection of thousands of lines of SQL stored procedures to a message based system to ensure better scalability, reliability while increasing performance 50x. Backend is Topshelf application hosting Hangfire for scheduling and MassTransit 3.0 for ESB
Performed technical screenings of interview candidates to ensure not only candidates had the appropriate skill but also where a good cultural fit
Performed code reviews on all committed line-of-business code to ensure standards and quality were met

work.summary: Cloud Automation Team Lead and .NET Architect
highlights: Designed SOA layer architecture and led development for VMWare / Hyper-V provisioning. Implemented using WCF and ASP.NET WebAPI 1.0
Managed and colaborated with geographically diverse team to implement portal front end for Total Cloud product
Provided software guidance, established technical roadmaps, and documented coding standards and procedures for team
Worked with product development and cloud engineering teams to establish product feature set and implementation paths
Led team that won innovation award for custom communication protocol over Hyper-V KVP
Oversaw custom written billing system and led PCI compliance initiatives
Coordinated with change management and deployment teams to guide releases
Worked with primary business stakeholders to integrate existing MaximumASP systems into Cbeyond systems

work.summary: Designed software architecture and UI of primary business Portal used by both internal employees and customers utilizing C#, ASP.Net 4, HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript / jQuery
highlights: Created coding standards and guidelines used by all team members for projects
Implemented continuous integration utilizing CruiseControl and later TeamCity
Designed and developed supporting provisioning web services wrapping third party hardware and software implementations in C# utilizing .NET ASMX Services / WCF / Rest API
Member of product design, architecture and implementation team for Cloud Servers and Cloud Sites products
Wrote support applications for networking and hardware teams
Design and created NOC / SOC monitoring software for real time display of critical security, support, hardware and networking information utilizing SOA, HTML, CSS3 and jQuery
Worked as Tier 3 support with customers to troubleshoot deployment and integration issues with our platform
Wrote knowledge base articles to assist both internal employees and customers with common deployment and application issues with our environment
